ygData.subject: Re: Fiery Avenger really that good?
ygData.msgSnippet: Thats right!  I forgot about charm, my enchanter friend charms a wisp.. you don t have a magic weapon, lol you are screwed ... From: Jonathan
ygData.messageBody:
Thats right! I forgot about charm, my enchanter friend charms a wisp.. you
don't have a magic weapon, lol you are screwed

-----Original Message-----
From: Jonathan [mailto:jp1234@...]
Sent: Tuesday, June 29, 1999 3:49 PM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Fiery Avenger really that good?


From: "Jonathan" <jp1234@...>

Once someone's charmed.. it isnt too hard to win :)
